text: "Feels Like Home" (stylized in all caps) is a song by American singer Bea Miller and Canadian singer Jessie Reyez. It was released as a single on August 23, 2019. The song was later included on the compilation EP, Lust, on September 25, 2020. ==Background== The song was first announced by Miller on her Twitter account on August 20, 2019. A video of Miller singing part of the song was released on the same date. The next day, fans could unlock a preview of the song if they tweeted the hashtag "#feelslikehome". ==Music video== On August 22, 2019, Miller announced that the music video would drop on the same date as the song. ==Release history== {|class="wikitable plainrowheaders" border="1" |- !scope="col"|Country !scope="col"|Date !scope="col"|Format !scope="col"|Label !scope="col"| |- !scope="row"|Various |August 23, 2019 | |Hollywood |align="center"| |} ==References== Category:2019 songs Category:2019 singles Category:Bea Miller songs Category:Hollywood Records singles Category:Jessie Reyez songs Category:Songs written by Bea Miller Category:Songs written by Jessie Reyez
title: Feels like Home (Bea Miller and Jessie Reyez song)
